GUIDING PRINCIPLES FOR FEEDING NON-BREASTFED CHILDREN 
6–24 MONTHS OF AGE
1. Ensure that energy needs are met.
2. Gradually increase food consistency and variety as the infant gets older, adapting to 
the infant’s requirements and abilities.
